jobDescription: 48408 Clinical Info Systems  701 E. Franklin Street, Richmond, VA 23219  Full time  1: Days  Report writ. Exp. In one programming language preferd.VCU Health System's Clinical Information Systems is seeking a full time Clinical Apps Staff Cerner CCL report writer to perform information technology functions to support and implement electronic medical records and other identified clinical systems. Responsibilities Independently determines and develops approaches to solutions with work completed with accuracy and sound judgment ensuring objectives are met.  Work hours and work day requirements may vary based on job assignment. QualificationsRequired Position requires a Bachelor's Degree with three (3) years of related experience, or equivalent combination of related education and experience. Preferred Related certification  Candidates should have experience in at least one programming language. Particularly attractive candidates will have Cerner CCL background and an understanding of the Cerner data model.  EOE/M/F/Vet/Disabled  Qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to their protected veteran or disability status.PTO
